column4: is there any reason ubuntu studio would be more unstable than vanilla? im getting constant freezes doing simple tasks like listening to music, surfing etc
is jaunty a huge imporvment over hardy?
sorry, i'll repahrse my question. I'm running 9.04 and getting random freezes and restarts, would downgrading to hardy help this ie is it more stable?
AFAIK the big difference between vanilla ubuntu and studio are the Kernel with RT. Id google if that could possibly be giving your hardware some issues
